All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Board
Represents a game board in Battleship.
Cell
Represents a cell in the game board.
Cell.CellState
Enumeration of possible states a Cell can be in.
Coordinate
Represents a coordinate on the game board.
EndGameController
Controller for the End Game screen.
Game
Manages the state and logic of a Battleship game session.
Game.Turn
Enumeration to represent the current turn of the game.
GameController
Controller class for the main game screen in the Battleship game.
GameStage
Represents the main game window for the application.
HomeController
Controller class for the home screen of the Battleship game.
IncompleteBoard
Exception thrown to indicate that an attempt was made to use a board that is incomplete that is where not all ships have been placed.
IPlaneTextFileReader
Interface for basic plain text file operations.
ISerializableFileHandler
The ISerializableFileHandler interface defines methods for serializing and deserializing objects to and from files.
IShip
Represents a ship in the game.
IShip.Orientation
Represents the orientation of a ship on the board.
IShip.State
Represents the sinking state of a ship.
Machine
Represents the machine (AI) opponent in the game.
Main
Entry point for the JavaFX application.
NonShootableCell
Exception thrown when an attempt is made to fire at a cell that cannot be shot, that is one that has already been hit.
OverlappingShip
RuntimeException thrown when a ship is attempted to be placed on a board cell that is already occupied by another ship.
PlainTextFileHandler
The PlainTextFileHandler class provides basic file operations for reading from and writing to plain text files.
Player
Represents a player in the game.
SerializableFileHandler
The SerializableFileHandler class provides functionality to serialize and deserialize Java objects to and from files using the Serializable interface.
ShapeDrawer
Provides methods to draw 2D shapes used to represent hits and misses on the board in the Battleship game.
Ship
Represents a ship in the Battleship game.
ShipAdapter
Abstract adapter class for ships in the game.
ShipDrawer
Utility class responsible for drawing ship assets as 2D shapes using the javafx.scene.shape methods.
ShipOutOfBounds
Exception thrown when a ship placement goes outside the boundaries of the board.
